name: filling
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ U ] any material used to fill something: duvets with synthetic filling
[ C or U ] the layer of food inside a sandwich, cake, etc.: pies with sweet or savoury fillings sandwich fillings
[ C ] the artificial substance put into holes in teeth to repair them

If food is filling, you feel full after you have eaten only a little of it.

Add to word list
Add to word list
making you feel full after eating only a small amount: This chocolate cake is very filling.
a material put inside of something: [ U ] What sort of filling do these pillows have?
A filling is also a substance put into the space in a tooth where decayed material has been removed.
